id.docs:
**[ID](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-id)**: Manually specify the ID for this ADS1115 Hub. Use this if you want to use multiple ADS1115 hubs at once.

*See also: [ads1115 Component/Hub](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/ads1115.html#configuration-variables)*

continuous_mode.docs:
**boolean**: Set if the ADS1115 should continuously measure voltages or only measure them when an update is called. Please enable this for the [CT Clamp Current Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/ct_clamp.html) component. Defaults to `off`.

*See also: [ads1115 Component/Hub](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/ads1115.html#configuration-variables)*

address.docs:
**int**: The i²c address of the sensor. See [I²C Addresses](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/ads1115.html#ads1115-i2c-addresses) for more information.

*See also: [ads1115 Component/Hub](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/ads1115.html#configuration-variables)*

ads1115_id.docs:
**[ID](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-id)**: Manually specify the ID of the [ADS1115 Hub](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/ads1115.html#ads1115-component) you want to use this sensor.

*See also: [ads1115 Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/ads1115.html#id1)*

multiplexer.docs:
The multiplexer channel of this sensor. Effectively means between which pins you want to measure voltage.

*See also: [ads1115 Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/ads1115.html#id1)*

gain.docs:
**float**: The gain of this sensor.

*See also: [ads1115 Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/ads1115.html#id1)*

resolution.docs:
**string**: the resolution of this sensor. Defaults to `16 bits`.

*See also: [ads1115 Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/ads1115.html#id1)*

sample_rate.docs:
**int**: The sample rate of this sensor. Defaults to `860`.

*See also: [ads1115 Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/ads1115.html#id1)*

update_interval.docs:
**[Time](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-time)**: The interval to check the sensor. Defaults to `60s`.

*See also: [ads1115 Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/ads1115.html#id1)*
